alert.note: Alert for Berks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 2:24PM EST until December 19 at 1:51AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Schuylkill River At Berne affecting Berks County. For the Schuylkill River...including Philadelphia near 30th Street, Berne, Reading, Pottstown, Norristown, Philadelphia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schuylkill River at Berne. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Open adjacent land begins to flood between Shoemakersville and Hamburg. At 12.0 feet, Miller Street in Shoemakersville floods. At 14.0 feet, Mohrsville Road in Perry Township floods. Second Street in Shoemakersville floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:00 PM EST Monday was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and will gradually fall to a stage of 12.5 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.3 feet on 12/14/1983. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (1 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Stg Time Date Schuylkill River Berne 12.0 13.2 Mon 1 pm 10.7 9.5 Crested &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 200 AM EST.
